Package simulator

This package contains data types for creating scheduling simulations.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    InterruptHandler
    Interface for a kernel that handles interrupts such as timeouts and completion of device I/O operations.
    Kernel
    Interface to the simulated kernel.
    ProcessControlBlock
    Abstract Description of Process Control Block used by kernel and simulator.
    SystemCall
    System call interface for OS kernel.
    SystemTimer
    A SystemTimer (i) provides support for simulated time, and (ii) support for the setting of timeout interrupts by kernel code.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Config
    The class manages the configuration and running of a simulation.
    CPU
    A CPU object stores the currently executing process, provides a method for performing context switches, and records the number of context switches that have occurred during execution.
    CPUInstruction
    Abstract representation of a block of program code describing a cpu burst.
    Instruction
    Representation of program instruction in abstract.
    IODevice
    Simulation of an IO device.
    IOInstruction
    Abstract representation of a block of program code describing an I/O burst.
    TRACE
    Controller for execution tracing.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ProcessControlBlock.State
    Possible process states.

Package simulator Description

This package contains data types for creating scheduling simulations.
